No. 838, No. 839,

Mise.

Mise.

Farbenfabriken Bayer A. G. v. United States. Farbenfabriken Bayer A. G. v. United States. Allen F. Maulsby, Arnold M. Lerman, Max 0. Truitt, Jr., and Daniel K. Mayers on the motions in both cases.

D. C. D. C.; and C. A. D. C. Cir. Motions for leave to file petitions for writs of certiorari denied.
